question_text:
Question 17
Which of the following heat treatment processes is/are used for surface hardening of steels?
(A) Carburizing 
 
 
(B) Cyaniding
(C) Annealing 
 
 
(D) Carbonitriding
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Heat treatment process is/are used for surface hardening of steel-

 
Cyaniding

 
Carbonitriding

 
Carburizing
Note :  
Surface hardening process 

 Cyaniding, Carbonitriding, Carburizing.
Surface softening process 

 Annealing.
Hence, the correct option is (A,B,C).
